name: LAPORAN HASIL SURVEY PELANGGAN
query:
SELECT
    a.pertanyaan,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) baik_sekali,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) baik,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) cukup,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) kurang,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) kurang_sekali,
    SUM(
        CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
        WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
        WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
        WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
        WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
        ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) skor,
    CASE WHEN
        SUM(
            CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
            ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) <= 4 AND
        SUM(
            CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
            ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) >= 3.2 THEN 'A'
    WHEN
        SUM(
            CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
            ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) < 3.2 AND
        SUM(
            CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
            ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) >= 2 THEN 'B'
    WHEN
        SUM(
            CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
            ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) < 2 THEN 'C'
    END status
    FROM `tabKuesioner Kepuasan Pelanggan Soal` a
    INNER JOIN `tabKuesioner Keupasan Pelanggan` b ON b.name = a.parent
    WHERE b.tanggal BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s
    GROUP BY a.pertanyaan
UNION
SELECT
    a.pertanyaan,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) baik_sekali,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) baik,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) cukup,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) kurang,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) kurang_sekali,
    SUM(
        CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
        WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
        WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
        WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
        WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
        ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) skor,
    CASE WHEN
        SUM(
            CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
            ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) <= 4 AND
        SUM(
            CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
            ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) >= 3.2 THEN 'A'
    WHEN
        SUM(
            CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
            ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) < 3.2 AND
        SUM(
            CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
            ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) >= 2 THEN 'B'
    WHEN
        SUM(
            CASE WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik Sekali" THEN 4
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Baik" THEN 3
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Cukup" THEN 2
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang" THEN 1
            WHEN a.jawaban = "Kurang Sekali" THEN 0
            ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(a.name) < 2 THEN 'C'
    END status
    FROM `tabKUESIONER LAPANGAN _ SOAL` a
    INNER JOIN `tabKUESIONER LAPANGAN` b ON b.name = a.parent
    WHERE b.tanggal BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s
    GROUP BY a.pertanyaan;
